author: Steve McCaskill
title: Openreach to prioritise 'essential' work and halts home visits during coronavirus
description: Openreach says it will focus on essential maintenance and repairs for critical customers.
content:
Openreach has confirmed its engineers will only carry out essential repairs and maintenance to its broadband network during the coronavirus outbreak.
In a televised address on Monday, Prime Minister Boris Johnson ordered the public to stay at home other than… [+1752 chars]
